item.title: Facebook to Pay $550 Million to Settle Facial Recognition Suit
item.description: Facebook to Pay $550 Million to Settle Facial Recognition Suit. Natasha Singer; Mike Isaac. The New York Times. https://www.nytimes.com/2020/01/29/technology/facebook-privacy-lawsuit-earnings.html . Jan 29, 2020. Illinois' biometric privacy law requires companies to obtain written permission before collecting a personâ€™s biometrics. Residents have the right to sue for up to $5,000 per violation. Facebook’s Tag Suggestions harvested facial data without getting written consent nor telling Illinois users for how long the data would be kept.
